Summary: three objects in the night sky one october evening
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting at my pick nick table watching the sky to the south from my home looking for satelites when i saw what i thought was a satelite coming from the south heading north it was bright orange in color. i was expecting it to come straight overhead when it just stopped in the sky at about 45% from where i was sitting it was the brightest thing in the sky. i ran into the house got my wife and had her come outside and sit with me just to watch it for a bit. as we were sitting there the object moved at a right angle from which it had come from for quite a distance towards the east it then slowed down and made a wobbly circle and stopped i asked my wife what she thought it was she said she didn't know and went in the house it was cold out. as i sat there watching it i saw a flash farther away than this object like a flash from a jet fighter and that flash took off towards the north now my curiosity was going i tried to watch the orange object with binoculars and a telescope but it looked the same as with my eye. as i watched the object for a bit it started moving towards the west and then it started moving away from me and then just disapeared in the sky. i then just sat there looking with my binoculars at where i had seen the flash in the sky to the east i was watching a star configuration that the flash had appeared near when all of a sudden i saw another flash and with the binoculars i could see some thing take off very fast in the same direction as the first flash and that was it. i have never seen any thing like that again
